BRANCH: This is only used by argocd for deciding which branch to deploy
and it often overridden by `install-argo-cd.sh` anyway. It should be fine to leave this as `master`
KRATOS_WEB_ROOT: Set this to 'https://fnhs-dev-$YOURNAME.westeurope.cloudapp.azure.com' for testing your cluster
This is a work-around until https://github.com/ory/kratos/pull/617 gets finished and released.
